input_text.Prompt:
Given a product name and product specifications, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Product name:
Pavilion Gift Company 19062 Light Your Way Memorial Forever in Our Hearts Angel Figurine, 4-1/2-Inch

Product specifications:
Reads "Forever in our hearts"
High quality polyresin construction
Comes in an attractive gift box
Memorial Gift
input_text.Response A: This beautiful angel figurine makes a touching memorial gift, featuring the sentiment "Forever in our Hearts." Crafted of high quality polyresin, this 4-1/2-inch figurine is delicately detailed and beautifully painted, and comes in an attractive gift box.
input_text.Response B: This gorgeous 4-1/2-inch tall angel figurine is the perfect memorial gift for the people you love. Her gown and wings are accented with silver bells and delicate rosemaling. Her white roses are a heartfelt symbol of remembrance. The bottom of the box reads "Forever in our hearts." The angel is holding a rose in one hand and a card with the message "Memories are like roses. They last forever in our hearts." This beautiful gift is the perfect way to express your love and affection.

label_annotations.factors_b: Response B makes up information about the product that was not included in the prompt.
